column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''31''' is the thirty-first issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "The 'King's Letter': An Historical and Comparative Analysis" — [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
